Params: {3: "Zong freezes as the soldier falls, Zong's arm still holding up his gun mid-air for a counterattack."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Having fired the last bullet, you insert a new magazine into your pistol before walking over to the stunned Zong.'}
{3: 'He seems to have just snapped out of his daze.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "It's not about whether or not I'm okay!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "Didn't we agree I'd handle the rebels while you focus on the Hetero-Creatures?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zong pulls at his hair, his face contorted with guilt.'}
{2: "It was an emergency. We can't afford to worry too much.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "He wasn't a Corrupted or a Hetero-Creature... H-he was...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bright red blood slowly seeps and spreads from the corpse's back—something that never happens to Corrupted or Hetero-Creatures."}
{3: 'A human body is such a fragile thing. One bullet to the heart is all it needs to take away its ability to fight.'}
{3: 'You experience this firsthand for the first time.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "That's not supposed to happen... You're the hero who leads the fight against the Punishing Virus. You shouldn't have been the one who did it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Using all your strength to stop your right hand from trembling, you pull Zong up from the ground. Right as you are about to leave...'}
{3: 'A chilling sensation crawls up your back.'}
{3: 'The fallen corpse slowly melts into the purple field as the figure of a young woman gradually emerges above the rotting blood.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "This is the third time we've met each other, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She curtsies in almost the same way as last time.'}
{3: 'Zong immediately steps in front of you and aims his rifle at her.'}
{3: 'She does not try to dodge away, however. Instead, she stares down the barrel aiming at her curiously.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Is this what hostility looks like in the real world? The instinct living organisms have developed to protect others... No. This is slightly different.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She mutters to herself, seemingly lost in thought.'}
{3: 'She lands on the ground. The melted corpse has been fully absorbed by the purple field.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "But please forgive me. I don't yet have the words to accurately describe my relationship with this land.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'If you wish to leave, you can head that way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Because I want to see more stories.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I want to understand civilizations, societies... humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'The stories of humans are more important than humans themselves.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'So I sincerely hope you will leave more stories behind.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Now, please allow me to take my leave.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And she vanishes as abruptly as she has arrived.'}
{2: 'But it seems something bad will happen in the Hetero Zone.', 3: '101'}
{3: 'Zong looks at the spot where Cradle has vanished, his usually cheerful face now full of worry.'}
{3: 'Escaping the besiegement of your new pursuers...'}
{3: 'You can finally see normal daylight through the gaps in the treetops...'}
{3: 'Your almost half-year-long escape seems to be nearing its end...'}
{3: 'Crossing the boundary between the strange and the normal, you can sense that the air is no longer tinged with the sickly sweet, rotten smell.'}
{3: 'Excited by the impending end of your ordeal, you have failed to notice...'}
{3: "Staring at the gaping hole in Watanabe's chest, Zong seems to have been transported back to that helpless afternoon."}
{1: '1', 3: 'He desperately tries to keep Watanabe alive, but he is powerless to do anything.'}
{3: 'With his own bomb-scarred body, Zong tries to drag Watanabe away from the battlefield.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He sees a girl in a green robe walking on the purple field. Corpses sink into the soil wherever she steps.'}
{2: '????', 3: 'His... core, I suppose? It was shattered by the bomb earlier.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She pauses until she finds the right way to phrase it.'}
{2: '????', 3: 'He will enter an eternal sleep very soon.', 4: '2'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Please leave him to me. His story will be passed on through me.', 4: '2'}
{2: '????', 3: "He won't, not unless someone is willing to exchange their core with him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I can! We'll find a way once we get to the camp!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zong suddenly realizes that only the Forsaken know their whereabouts. Returning now might mean walking into a trap.'}
{3: 'The girl does not seem to notice his hesitation and asks gently.'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Is this what you call a sacrifice?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I won't let the same thing happen again!", 4: '1'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Alright, I accept your deal. This will be a new story for me.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The purple field envelops the two of them.'}
{2: '????', 3: "Since I've fulfilled your request, I shall claim my rewards as part of the deal. It is only fair.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hearing your call, Zong slowly opens his eyes. He has no idea how long he has leaned against a tree.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I remember now... I've seen... that green robe before... after we were attacked..."}
{3: 'He tries to speak in his usual cheerful tone, but his strength is fading.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'She... helped transfer my core into Watanabe... and then installed something else where my core used to be.'}
{3: 'After entering the Clean Zone and crossing the boundary between the strange and the normal, Zong felt the thing in his chest disappear.'}
{2: "I'll get you out of the Clean Zone immediately!", 3: '197'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Commandant... I want to know... Did I do the right thing?'}
{3: 'You do not know what to answer.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I'm not very bright, Commandant... or very strong... I haven't been much help... even after I became a Construct."}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "So... That was the only way... I didn't want to feel powerless like I did back then..."}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Still... I had to rely on others in the end...'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Commandant, tell me... Will Watanabe... be infected because of what I did?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: "That wasn't me... I'm merely a reader here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I've finished reading the story in his heart. As a part of our deal, I shall return the book intact.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "That's good. I've been afraid... that I've turned Watanabe into something he hates."}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'But it must be okay... if someone like you... promise.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I don't want to become... a Corrupted... I've seen the face Watanabe made when he had to execute the comrades who'd turned..."}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "It was hard to watch... So don't make me go back... please..."}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "Don't feel sad for me, Commandant... After all, I've finally achieved what I always wanted... even though I needed some help..."}
{3: 'He slowly raises his right hand to salute you.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Can I ask you one last favor?'}
{3: "Sunlight slowly shines on the young man's face as if covering him with a layer of golden sand."}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Please tell Watanabe that the little crybaby who used to be a burden...'}
{3: 'His hand falls as he falls silent, never to rise again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Rookie', 3: 'Hey, someone seems to be coming.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Veteran', 3: 'Where? Is it a Babylonian? Have they finally lost their patience?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Rookie', 3: "Doesn't seem to be coming from the same direction... And that person's carrying someone?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "Strange. I don't think that person's armed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Feeling the weight behind your back, you walk forward step by step.'}
{3: 'Sweat soaks through the bandages on your body. Yet to fully heal, wounds new and old begin to ache.'}
{3: 'You do not have to look up to feel countless barrels coldly aiming at you from both sides.'}
{3: 'You take a deep breath and pull out two flags from your pocket.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "Yeah. You'll use that one, Commandant, and I'll use this one.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I didn't know you knew how to do this.", 3: '276'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "Hehe. I've been practicing for a long time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You know this is a dangerous move, but without Zong, this is the only way to get both sides to the negotiating table.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'To hold up your end of the deal with him...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'To not break the promise you made to yourself...'}
{3: 'Two flags flutter above the buffer zone, one bearing the emblem of raven feathers and a shield, the other a symbol of a gas mask, sand, and fire.'}
{2: 'I will unveil the truth of this war!'}
